body_html: We should probably introduce lazy adam. See https://twitter.com/haldaume3/status/901434195117051904 and https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/sparse-embedding-failing-with-adam-torch-cuda-sparse-floattensor-has-no-attribute-addcmul-/5589 as data-points
